divs: Sighting DetailsI have seen it a total number of 4 times now. It has a steady orange light that does not flash. It glides across the sky and makes no noise. It is much larger than an airplane or anything like that. Tonight we seen it again and this time when it was gliding across the sky the orange light disappeared, it was around 9:30 so you could still see just a bit gliding across the sky with the ligths out almost invisible.
Summary: Bright orange UFO spotted over Cambridge Ontario
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Cambridge
There were no other sightings in Cambridge on or around August 25th 2012
